features: Compact and Stylish: 2 Tier Shelf Cube Bookcase is Ideal for Small Spaces, Apartments, Dorms Or Any Place With Limited Amount of Space. the Small Bookcase Cubby Shelf is Thus Perfect for Kid's Rooms to Guest Rooms With the Easy Accessible Shelves to Add a Minimalistic Aesthetic.

STUDY AND DURABLE: Made out of sturdy MDF boards, the 2 tier bookshelf is sturdy, and can withold 30kg/66.2lbs per shelf, whether the cube storage organizer is being used horizontally or vertically. Heavier items should be placed on the bottom shelf if being used vertically.

VERSATILE: The 2 tier bookshelf can be used as a vertical or horizontal cute shelf, cubby shelf, night stand, coffee table, end table, storage shelf, or shelf organizer for books, toys, home décor, plants, magazines, gaming console systems in the living room, bedroom, office, bathroom, gaming room, kids room, or dormitory.
EASY ASSEMBLY: All of the parts to build the 2 tier cube bookshelf are included and only requires a screwdriver to secure the MDF boards together. Compliant with CARB regulation 93120 – Phase 2.
ASSEMBLED DIMENSIONS: Outer dimensions: 16.34"L x 11.42"W x 23.43"H, Inner shelf dimensions: 15.35”L x 10.83”W x 10.83”H
body.description: Solve your limited space issues with this IRIS 2-tier bookshelf! Compact storage 2 feet high, this versatile bookcase can be used vertically or horizontally. Store heavier objects in the lower level of the wooden bookshelf while protecting precious items in the shelf above. Use bookshelves in living room, office, kitchen, or bedroom. Contemporary bookcase available in other multiple colors and sizes. Assembly required. Inner cube ASSEMBLED DIMENSIONS: 15. 35”W x 10. 83”Lx 10. 83”H. Weight Tolerance: 66 lbs. per shelf. Compliant with CARB Regulation 93120 – Phase 2.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The screws do not match with the directions but they are perfect for the product.
reviews.reviewText: I purchased these bookcases at the suggestion of another Amazon customer. I am using them, as she has, as a brace and extra storage for a sewing cabinet I purchased. (excellent advice and very appreciated). They are easy to put together and sturdy and who can't use more storage. As I have 4-5 sewing and crafts in my craft room. storage is a BIG must. As I put in the headline, the screws I received were different then the directions, but worked out perfect. Very easy to assemble and will be added storage that is very needed. I am an avid Amazon customer as stores are stocking less and less with Covid issues and have had great service with product, returns and shipping. I would definitely recommend this product for craft rooms or other rooms where buying an expensive piece of furniture would be a poor use of dollars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice looking unit.
reviews.reviewText: Went together easily, and it makes a great looking bedside shelf unit. Exactly what I was looking for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute and efficient for space
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This product is good and sturdy enough to hold the few books and some small decor on top. Just don’t lean on it because it will tilt. The assemble was a little difficult but nothing unbearable; probably took me like 10-15 mins to put together. Overall a nice purchase for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Assemble, Aesthetically Pleasing, and Sturdy
reviews.reviewText: This storage shelf arrived today and the box it came it was very well protected from impact damage during shipping. Assembly took less than 10 minutes and was very intuitive, though instructions are included as well. The holes drilled into the material are the perfect size for the screws provided. You will only need a philips "+" screwdriver to tighten the screws in place. An extra screw and screw cap are provided in case you misplace one during assembly. No felt pads or rubber bumpers are included for the base, but I had some so I applied them to the base to eliminate contact will the floor. The material is smooth unlikely to chip unless you scrape it with something heavy and metallic. I even bumped the screwdriver head into the sides a couple of times and there was no damage to the surface. The size is perfect for use as a bookshelf as you can see in the images, and I expect this shelf to last as long as I treat it well. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Okay for value
reviews.reviewText: This shelf is cute and was decent to assemble, but the quality of the parts is subpar. It’s not super sturdy and is wobbly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Very nice little sturdy piece of furniture! It fits perfectly under my desk with some room on top for my laptop. And a bonus, the boxes I got fit in it perfectly as well! (From separate buyer). They give you nice stickers to cover the screws. Maybe that wouldn’t look nice in the room alone but under my desk you don’t notice it! You can always solve that with paint I am sure, or putty. Anyways, very easy to assemble I did it all by myself and am very happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars You get what you pay for
reviews.reviewText: This is by no means a sturdy piece of furniture. Very basic quality for very basic needs. If you want sturdy furniture for your living space, room or garage then this is not for you. This is at best a furniture item to keep in a corner to keep stowaways and where there is no need to move this piece.What you may like: Inexpensive, shows as in pictures. Finish is OK as well.What you may not like: Although assembly is easy, it is also easy to make unrecoverable mistakes. Take it slow, follow instructions, do not over tighten the screws and use your head mostly. This is not sturdy furniture. It is meant to be kept in a corner, put items in/on it and not move it a lot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great book shelf
reviews.reviewText: I love that it's small so I dont have it taking up much room in my craft room. I have some tall books so I turned it on its side and it works perfect. It was so simple to put together and is very sturdy. Would recommend.
